t487 India v Australia Australia in India and Pakistan 1959/60 (5th Test) VenueEden Gardens, Calcutta on 23rd, 24th, 25th, 27th, 28th January 1960 (5-day match) Balls per over6 TossIndia won the toss and decided to bat ResultMatch drawn UmpiresSK Ganguli, ND Sane Close of play day 1India (1) 158/7 (Ramchand 12*, Jaisimha 2*) Close of play day 2Australia (1) 229/3 (O'Neill 93*, Burge 43*) Close of play day 3India (2) 67/2 (Roy 31*, Jaisimha 0*) Close of play day 4India (2) 243/6 (Jaisimha 59*, Kenny 26*)

--> RB Kenny made his last appearance in Test matches
